entry.title: Markdown博客
entry.content:
第一篇MarkDown博客，使用学习MarkDown基本语法。

@插入两个以上的空格然后回车，即表示 < /br>

这是一个普通段落:

这是一个代码区块
Here is an example of AppleScript:

    tell application "Foo"
        beep
    end tell
© 2013 ccWulang Corporation

表格:

First Header Second Header Third Header
Content Cell Content Cell Content Cell

图片:

自动链接:

http://example.com

This is an example inline link. This link has no title attribute.
See my About page for details.
This is ” title=”google”>Google

I get 10 times more traffic from ” title=”Yahoo Search”>Yahoo or ” title=”google”>Google than from ” title=”MSN”>MSN.

强调:

single asterisks

single asterisks

double asterisks

double asterisks

unfriggingbelevable

代码:

Use the printf() function

There is a literal backtick (`) here.

A single backtick in a code span: `

A backtick-delimited string in a code span: `foo`

Please don’t use any <blank> tags.

— is the decimal-encoded equivalent of —.

这是 H1

这是 H2

这是 H3

这是 H4

这是 H5
这是 H6

This is a blockqutoe with tow pargraphs.

Donec sit amet nisl. Aliquam semper ipsum sit amet velit.

This is nested blockquote.

Back to the first level.

这是一个标题.

  1. 这是第一行列表项
  2. 这是第二行列表项

给出一些例子:

return shell_exec(“echo $input | $markdown_script”);
